quiz.question: Why is getting into college difficult?
options: Because students need more than good grades
quiz.answer: Because students need more than good grades

quiz.question: What do students need besides good grades?
Why are essays important?
options: They help students get better grades

quiz.question: What happens if a student has great grades but a boring essay?
options: They might not get into college
quiz.answer: They might not get into college
